data.title: Corporate adventure & Retreat in Ontario
data.meta_description: Elevate your team building with the best corporate adventure & retreat in Ontario. Strengthen relationships and create lasting memories. Book now!
data.text:
Meeting Spaces & Boardrooms

All event spaces come with unlimited wi-fi, TV/HDMI hook-up with speakers as well as access to our refreshment & snack menu.

FORESTVIEW PAVILION: 60 guests (inside) - 100 with patio

BARREL ROOM: 15 guests

UPSIDE BOARDROOM: 12 guests (inside) - 80 with patio

SKYVIEW TOWER: 30 guests (inside) - 45 with screened-in porch

PRODUCTION ROOM: 25 guests

BKW EVENT PAVILION: 150 guests

Book a meeting with groups sales >

Download our look book to see more details>

Unique Lodging

We have a variety of different lodging types on-site to accommodate all group sizes and preferences. All of our lodging comes with unlimited wi-fi, linens and towels & access to our trail network.

TOTAL ROOMS: 43

TOTAL BEDS: 55

Prices range from $99 - $324 per night. Dependant on season and unit type.

CAMPING PODS: 4 units (2 twin, 2 queen)

DELUXE PODS: 10 units (queen & pull-out sofa)

ELITE PODS: 3 units (queen)

WILDERNESS SUITES: 15 units (7 double queen, 8 king)

MABEE MARSH CABIN: 4 bedrooms (2 double, 1 king, 1 queen)+ 3 pods (queen in each)

ROLLERCOASTER BUNKHOUSE: 4 bedrooms (3 queen, 1 king)

Book a meeting with groups sales >

Download our look book to see more details>

Unique Activities

We have a variety of different tours & adventures on-site that are fully customizable. We will work with you to ensure we develop a team building program that focuses on your distinct needs. We are all about that ROI.

Prices range from $49 - $119 per guest. Group pricing is available.

TEAM BUILDING PACKS: Our team building packs are fully customizable, allowing you to handpick from a diverse selection of engaging and nature-oriented activities. Whether you're looking to strengthen team cohesion, improve communication skills, or foster creativity, our tailor-made experiences are designed to meet your specific goals and objectives.

ZIP-LINE & CANOPY TOURS:Experience the thrill of gliding through the treetops on our exhilarating 2.5-hour tour through the Carolinian forest! Our knowledgeable guides will share fascinating history along the way, offering your team the adventure they crave.

AXE THROWING TOURS: book this 2 hour challenge with our knowledgeable games, and put your lumberjack skills to the test! This fun - yet unique - adventure experience is the ultimate ice breaker!

KAYAK & NATURE TOURS: Whether you prefer to immerse yourself in the wonders of nature through an interpretive hike, stargaze during an observatory tour, or glide peacefully along the serene waters on a big creek kayak, we offer a diverse range of outdoor experiences that are sure to transport you from the confines of the office to the breathtaking beauty of the great outdoors.

Book a meeting with groups sales >

Download our look book to see a full list of tours >

Corporate Experts

Choose from a curated selection of experts in our portfolio, each specializing in a range of topics. Whether you're seeking a dynamic presentation that will captivate your team, a birding lesson tailored for beginners, or a crash course in sustainability, we have established connections with industry leaders who will deliver a truly unforgettable learning experience. Your team will return to the office inspired and armed with new knowledge to drive innovation and growth.

Book a meeting with groups sales >

Download our look book to see more details >
